segments.advisor_message: So, um, let’s talk about your dependents—like, do you have a name for, you know, any dependents you wanna add? Any, uh, details there?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! Uh, yeah! My daughter’s name is, um, Mia, yeah, Mia Johnson. And, uh, she's, uh, born on, uh, 15th of August, 2015. But, um, I think she’ll, uh, maybe be, like, a dependent only till she, uh, turns 18, you know? So, that’d be, like, 15, um, August 2033 or so.
